title: Tethering on xbox one
content:
Hey all, am staying in a hotel which has terrible wifi so am trying to hotspot my pixel and allow the xbox one to connect on its wifi, however i keep getting a teredo error?!?

Any idea how to help? I dont have access to a laptop to link phone an use that as a hotspot just my phone, also in the past it has worked for two days while i had to wait for new router at home so i know it can but now it always states the same error on xbox.

If you can fix this you would be my hero, the hotel am in is crap SAVE ME!!!!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
